dcterms:creator: F. Martelli
N. Kalach
G. Tola
R. Navigli
dcterms:description: A dataset for multilingual and cross-lingual word-in-context disambiguation, containing 20,000 words across five languages: Arabic, Chinese, English, French, and Russian, divided into training and testing sets.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2021 Task 2: Multilingual and Cross-lingual Word-in-Context Disambiguation
